properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
ST LUCIA TO AZORES.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM S/V MORGAN,
THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, BETWEEN MARIGOT BAY (13-57.5N 061-01.4W)
AND LA HORTA (38-34.0N 028-42.0W). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422 799 024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 596 596 709 292, FAX: 596 596 632 450.
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
